Of course! I'd be happy to recommend some action movies based on your interest! Here are two movie suggestions from the list:

* John Wick (2014) - This stylish and adrenaline-fueled film follows a retired hitman who seeks revenge against a powerful crime lord after his dog is killed. Starring Keanu Reeves, it's a thrilling ride with impressive fight choreography and a gripping storyline.
* Mad Max: Fury Road (2015) - Set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, this movie follows a tough woman warrior (Charlize Theron) and a fugitive (Tom Hardy) as they team up to take down the tyrannical leader of a cult. With heart-pumping action sequences and a powerful feminist message, Mad Max is a must-see for fans of the genre.
